T:umbraco.uicontrols.TreeUrlGenerator
member.summary: This class will generate the URLs for iframe tree pages. Generally used to get the a tree picker url.
member.remarks: This was created in 4.1 so that this helper class can be exposed to other assemblies since it only existed in the presentation assembly in previous versions
